import React from "react"; const Services = () => { const services = [ { icon: ( ), title: "Build Your Career", description: "Guiding students and professionals to shape their career paths with the right skills, confidence, and mentorship.", features: [ "Career Planning", "Skill Assessment", "Goal Setting", "One-on-One Mentorship", ], }, { icon: ( ), title: "Motivation & Mentorship", description: "Inspiring learners to stay motivated, overcome challenges, and achieve their academic and professional goals.", features: [ "Personal Guidance", "Confidence Building", "Goal Achievement", "Continuous Support", ], }, ]; return (
{/* Heading */}

My Services

Helping learners and professionals achieve their goals through guidance, technology skills, and mentorship.

{/* Services Grid */}
{services.map((service, index) => (
{service.icon}

{service.title}

{service.description}

    {service.features.map((feature, featureIndex) => (
  • {feature}
    • ))}
))}
{/* CTA Section */}

Ready to Start Your Journey?

Let's discuss how I can help you grow your career and skills.

); }; export default Services;
